content: cowl out on blocking mats or a bed covered with a towel pin out the cowl stretching it slightly so that it forms a rectangle line up the picots on both sides and pin through both picots so that they are pulled out and even along the edges let dry for 24 hours please post your projects in ravelry and link to the pattern page also follow me on instagram @cjbradydesigns pattern & photos are copyright © cj brady designs/2018| ravel y cj brady instagram @cjbradydesigns tag projects #cjbradydesigns
